semantic_identifier: [GOLD-139]: Make cluster summaries and representative examples idempotent across re-ingest
title: Make cluster summaries and representative examples idempotent across re-ingest

sections.text: Cluster summaries and “representative examples” currently shift or duplicate when the same source conversations are re-ingested, even when cluster IDs/membership are stable. Update the summary/exemplar generation step to be deterministic (stable ordering, fixed sampling strategy, and versioned prompt/model inputs) and to upsert results per cluster rather than creating new records. Add a regression test that replays the same ingestion twice and asserts identical summary text/exemplar IDs (or stable selected conversation IDs) for each cluster.
